IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: MOBILIZING AND INTEGRATING CRITICAL RESOURCES AND OPPORTUNITIES TO STRENGTHEN FAMILIES AND DEVELOP SUSTAINABLE COMMUNITIES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: MOBILIZING AND INTEGRATING CRITICAL RESOURCES AND OPPORTUNITIES TO STRENGTHEN FAMILIES AND DEVELOP SUSTAINABLE COMMUNITIES.
IRS990.Desc: CHILD WELFARE:FOSTER CARE SERVICES PROVIDED FOR INDIVIDUALS. PROVIDES A TEMPORARY, SAFE HOME FOR CHILDREN IN CRISIS UNTIL FAMILY CONFLICTS ARE RESOLVED AND THEY CAN BE REUNITED WITH THEIR FAMILIES. THE GOAL OF FOSTER CARE IS TO REUNITE FOSTER CHILDREN WITH THEIR BIOLOGICAL FAMILIES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: YOUTH OUTREACH PROGRAMS INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING:HEART OF PEORIA AFTER SCHOOL AND SUMMER PROGRAM, DAY RESPITE PROGRAM FOR CHILDREN, PROJECT RESPITE HELP PROGRAM, FAMILY SCHOOL LIAISON PROGRAM, AND YOUTH ANGER MANAGEMENT PROGRAM.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: COUNSELING:COUNSELING SERVICES PROVIDED FOR INDIVIDUALS. SPECIALTY AREAS INCLUDE: DEPRESSION, ANXIETY, PARENT-CHILD CONFLICTS/PARENTING, SCHOOL PROBLEMS, PRE-MARITAL/MARITAL CONCERNS, JOB RELATED/JOBLESSNESS CONCERNS, GRIEF/LOSS, ADOLESCENCE, TRAUMA AND STAGES OF LIFE ADJUSTMENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part V, Line 4: Intended uses of the endowment fund.
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Withdrawals from the endowment fund would be authorized by the board of the directors and would not exceed the earnings of the fund for the year.

THE FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING STANDARDS BOARD ISSUED GUIDANCE ON ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES. MANAGEMENT HAS EVALUATED THE ORGANIZATION'S TAX POSITIONS TAKEN AND CONCLUDED THAT THE ORGANIZATION HAD TAKEN NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT REQUIRE ADJUSTMENT TO THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS TO COMPLY WITH THE PROVISIONS OF THIS GUIDANCE. THE ORGANIZATION IS SUBJECT TO ROUTINE AUDITS BY TAXING JURIDICTIONS; HOWEVER, THERE ARE CURRENTLY NO AUDITS FOR ANY PERIODS IN PROGRESS. THE ORGANIZATION BELIEVES IT IS NO LONGER SUBJECT TO TAX EXAMINATIONS FOR THE YEARS ENDING PRIOR TO JUNE 30, 2019.

PART III, COL (B):THROUGH ILLINOIS DEPARTMENT OF CHILDREN & FAMILY SERVICES. ASSISTANCE CONSISTS OF BOARDING, CLOTHING, MEDICAL, DENTAL, HOSPITAL, AND INITIAL PLACEMENT AND OTHER SERVICES PROVIDED AS A PART OF THE GRANT.

OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES 4: MULTIPLE SERVICES TO SINGLE PARENTS. TITLE XX SOCIAL SERVICES PROVIDED TO INDIVIDUALS. OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES 5: YOUTH OUTREACH PROGRAMS INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING:HEART OF PEORIA AFTER SCHOOL AND SUMMER PROGRAM, DAY RESPITE PROGRAM FOR CHILDREN, PROJECT RESPITE HELP PROGRAM, FAMILY SCHOOL LIAISON PROGRAM, AND YOUTH ANGER MANAGEMENT PROGRAM.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CHAIRMAN OF THE FINANCE COMMITTEE REVIEWS THE FORM 990 AFTER IT IS COMPLETED. A COPY IS THEN MADE AVAILABLE TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR THEIR REVIEW PRIOR TO IT BEING FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15a
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COMMITTEE IS APPOINTED ANNUALLY BY THE PRESIDENT TO EVALUATE THE CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER'S PERFORMANCE AND DETERMINE COMPENSATION LEVELS. THIS COMMITTEE WILL REVIEW COMPENSATION AND BENEFIT STUDIES AVAILABLE ANNUALLY FROM NATIONAL ASSOCIATIONS, AND LOCAL EMPLOYER ASSOCIATION SURVEYS TO ADJUST FOR REGIONAL DIFFERENCES. THE COMMITTEE THEN PRESENTS THEIR RECOMMENDATION TO THE FULL BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR THEIR APPROVAL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AT THE PRESENT TIME, ALL DOCUMENTS ARE ONLY AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST, EXCEPT FOR THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, WHICH ARE AVAILABLE ON THE ORGANIZATION'S WEB-SITE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION, THROUGH ITS AUDIT COMMITTEE MEETS WITH THE AUDITOR TO REVIEW THE AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS REGARDING THE RESULTS OF THE AUDIT. THE FINANCE COMMITTEE INCLUDES TWO MEMBERS WHO ARE CPA'S. THE FINANCE COMMITTEE ALSO HAS THE RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE APPROVAL OF THE INDEPENDENT AUDITOR.
